channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Treasury confirms it's eyeing IRS for 'streamlining' shake-up as tax season heats up
item.description: The Trump administration's Treasury Department is considering a "wide range" of possibilities to streamline the tax agency, Fox News Digital learned.

item.title: Republican, independent voters loved pushback after Al Green disrupted Trump speech

item.title: Legal Watchdog: D.C. Police Demand $1.57 Million To Release Jan. 6 Bodycam Footage

item.title: From Havana, and Miami, a Freedom Fighter

item.title: Texas Democrat Rep. Sylvester Turner, 70, dies two months into first congressional term
item.description: Rep. Sylvester Turner, Texas Democrat and former mayor of Houston, died suddenly at age 70, just two months into his first congressional term.

item.title: GSA erases public list of federal properties to be sold
item.description: The General Services Administration already has removed an online list of more than 400 "non-core" federal properties it said it wanted to sell off.

item.title: Alito Scolds SCOTUS For Letting Rogue DC Judge Tell The Federal Government How To Spend Its Money
item.description: Alito concluded the high bench’s ruling was ‘a most unfortunate misstep that rewards an act of judicial hubris.’

item.title: Trump Proves The Border Bill Pushed By GOP Leaders Under Biden Was Never Necessary
item.description: In just six weeks under Trump, illegal immigration has fallen to record lows. Turns out we didn’t need Congress to act to secure the border.

item.title: Trump’s Victory Lap
item.description: The new president has a lot to boast about, but his fiscal and economic promises could set him up for failure.

item.description: Protecting our nation's safety and sovereignty is not an economic disaster. It's a patriotic duty.
